p: All chromones known in the genus including eriosematin ( 75), iso-eriosematin ( 76), eriosematin A-E ( 77â€“81) and eriosemaside A ( 82) were obtained from the roots of E. tuberosum ( Ma et al., 1995; 1996a; 1996b, 1999). Compound 81 was also identified in an ethanol root extract of E. chinense ( Prasad et al., 2017).
